info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Gets information about the specified network interface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterface resource.

put.description: Creates or updates a network interface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update network interface operation.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterface resource.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterface resource.

get.description: Gets all network interfaces in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkInterface resources.

get.description: Gets all network interfaces in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkInterface resources.

loadBalancerInboundNatRules.description: A list of references of LoadBalancerInboundNatRules.

privateIPAllocationMethod.description: Defines how a private IP address is assigned. Possible values are: 'Static' and 'Dynamic'.

primary.description: Gets whether this is a primary customer address on the network interface.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

dnsServers.description: List of DNS servers IP addresses. Use 'AzureProvidedDNS' to switch to azure provided DNS resolution. 'AzureProvidedDNS' value cannot be combined with other IPs, it must be the only value in dnsServers collection.

appliedDnsServers.description: If the VM that uses this NIC is part of an Availability Set, then this list will have the union of all DNS servers from all NICs that are part of the Availability Set. This property is what is configured on each of those VMs.

internalDnsNameLabel.description: Relative DNS name for this NIC used for internal communications between VMs in the same virtual network.

internalFqdn.description: Fully qualified DNS name supporting internal communications between VMs in the same virtual network.

NetworkInterfaceDnsSettings.description: DNS settings of a network interface.

virtualMachine.description: The reference of a virtual machine.

networkSecurityGroup.description: The reference of the NetworkSecurityGroup resource.

ipConfigurations.description: A list of IPConfigurations of the network interface.

dnsSettings.description: The DNS settings in network interface.

macAddress.description: The MAC address of the network interface.

primary.description: Gets whether this is a primary network interface on a virtual machine.

enableIPForwarding.description: Indicates whether IP forwarding is enabled on this network interface.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the network interface resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the public IP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

NetworkInterface.description: A network interface in a resource group.

value.description: A list of network interfaces in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkInterfaceListResult.description: Response for the ListNetworkInterface API service call.

privateIPAddress.description: The private IP address of the IP configuration.

privateIPAllocationMethod.description: The private IP allocation method. Possible values are 'Static' and 'Dynamic'.

subnet.description: The reference of the subnet resource.

publicIPAddress.description: The reference of the public IP resource.

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the public IP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
